name: AdVerit
tag_list: internet-marketing, website-design, outsourcing, email-marketing, sponsored-links, search-engine-optimization, adwords, surveys, promotions-and-online-games
overview:
AdVerit, created in 2005, is a company integrated by a group of young professionals from different areas that work tirelessly with one mission in mind: to offer the customer outstanding services in the form of comprehensive communication strategies.

  • What does AdVerit do?: Adverit creates, designs and delivers solutions used daily by millions of people. These solutions range from websites to back office tools, including application interfaces and actions for online promotions. With the experience acquired over the years, AdVerit has developed and implemented its own applications to provide a range of marketing tools which include: Marketing Services on the Internet, Search Engine Optimization Marketing and Email Marketing.

  • AdVeritâ€™s main goals: AdVerit aims to become a comprehensive technology partner for its customers through design and implementation of highly customized technology solutions at very competitive prices. We believe our goal can be achieved by applying our knowledge on a personalized level to each project, through proven developments, and through providing a unique management methodology with a special emphasis on delivery, time and form.
